title: Chasing the 'Ghost' - a superstar struck down by lightning
summary: John White did the League and Cup Double, but his sudden death left his son searching for the man behind the comic-book persona.

title: The rise and fall of North Korea - the sleeping giant of women's football
summary: North Korea lags behind most of the rest of the world in several areas. But the hermit state has had an outsized impact on international women's football.

title: The air crash and the underdogs - a triumph for a lost generation
summary: Nineteen years and 10 miles separated Zambia's football team from a lost, golden generation on a fateful night in Libreville.

title: East meets west London - the mentor who changed Chelsea
summary: Vinay Menon knew nothing about football when he went for a meeting at a west London mansion in 2009. A few weeks later he was in the heart of the Chelsea dressing room.

title: When River Plate icon Diaz took over fourth-tier Oxford
summary: Twenty years on from Ramon Diaz's surprising appointment at Oxford United, BBC Sport looks at what happened and how it went.
